amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that nothing in the bill would have the effect of changing or limiting any law or regulation requiring agencies to allow public comment or public participation in their decision-making process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 114-261 to clarify that nothing in the bill would have the effect of changing or limiting any law or regulation requiring agencies to allow public comment or public participation in their decision-making process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 232 (Roll no. 516).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 232 (Roll no. 516).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
